Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.Systems

Class EnemyMovementSystem

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.Systems.EnemyMovementSystem
public class EnemyMovementSystem extends Object
The EnemyMovementSystem class is responsible for updating the movement of enemy entities. It manages the movement of enemy entities based on their speed and screen boundaries.
Author:
Ahmad Shakleya

  • Method Details

    • updateEnemyMovement

      public void updateEnemyMovement()
      Updates the movement of the enemy entities. It handles the horizontal movement, direction changes, and reaching the screen boundaries.
